citeinfo.title: Underwater acoustic Data From Select Sites on Cumberland Island National Seashore (CUIS), May 2012 - May 2013
Spatial and Temporal Assessment of Back-Barrier Erosion on Cumberland Island National Seashore, Georgia, 2011–2013

descript.abstract: This dataset contains average sound intensity (in decibels full scale) for time windows when the water level was at or above the margin toe at four sites - Brickhill Bluff (bb), Dungeness Wharf (dw), Plum Orchard (po), and Racoon Key (rk) - along the back barrier margin of CUIS. Data were recorded with submerged hydrophones connected to a continuously recording data-logger. Additionally, this dataset presents average water level conditions when sound measurements were recorded.
descript.purpose: These data were collected in an attempt to monitor boat traffic and investigate possible correlations with erosion timing and magnitude at select locations along the back barrier of CUIS.

idinfo.datacred: funding provided by National Park Service Cumberland Island National Seashore

attracc.attraccr: No formal attribute accuracy tests were conducted

dataqual.logic: No formal logical accuracy tests were conducted
dataqual.complete: Data set is considered complete for the information presented, as described in the abstract. Users are advised to read the rest of the metadata record carefully for additional details.

horizpa.horizpar: No formal positional accuracy tests were conducted

vertacc.vertaccr: No formal positional accuracy tests were conducted

procstep.procdesc: Data were processed on several occasions using the same procedures which are briefly described below. Field measurments were conducted at each site to determine the level at which the waterlevel was reaching the margin toe. Data were screened to removed periods when erosion was not possible due to the waterlevel being lower than the margin toe. Further documentation of waterlvel thresholds is available in the complete report which is cited above.

enttyp.enttypd: Acoustic intensity averaged over 2 minute periods when the waterlevel was at or above the margin toe and the associated water level

attr.attrdef: Site identifier to which the data belong - Brickhill Bluff (bb), Dungeness Wharf (dw), Plum Orchard (po), and Racoon Key (rk)

attrdomv.udom: two letter representation of the site id

attr.attrdef: date and time that measurement(s) was collected
average water level in feet (above pressure transducer)

attrdomv.udom: average water level in feet (above pressure transducer)

attr.attrdef: average acoustic intensity in decibels full scale

attrdomv.udom: average acoustic intensity in decibels full scale (Dbfs)

cntaddr.address: Denver Federal Center, Building 810, Mail Stop 302

distinfo.distliab: There is no guarantee concerning the accuracy of the data. No warranty expressed or implied is made regarding the accuracy or utility of the data on any other system or for general scientific purposes, nor shall the act of distribution constitute any such warranty. Users should not use this data for critical applications without a full awareness of the limitations. Acknowledgement of originating agencies would be appreciated in products derived from this data.
